titlepage.publisher:
Special Collections & Archives
Wesleyan University
Middletown, CT, USA

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.physloc: For current information on the location of these materials, please consult Special Collections & Archives staff.
did.abstract: Daguerreotypes and an ambrotype make up the mid-nineteenth century cased images. Most of the images are individual head and shoulder portraits, some in composites, a few are full length portraits. Typically the individuals depicted bear a Wesleyan connection.

userestrict.head: Copyright Notice
userestrict.p: Copyright for official University records is held by Wesleyan University; all other copyright is retained by the authors of items in these papers, or their descendants, as stipulated by United States copyright law.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Item], Cased Images Collection, Collection 1000-210, Special Collections & Archives, Olin Library, Wesleyan University, Middletown CT.

acqinfo.head: Acquisitions Information
acqinfo.p: Special Collections & Archives staff assembled the cased images from individual donations. Individual donors, when known, are noted in listing.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Processed by Anne Ostendarp, 2012. Finding aid by Anne Ostendarp, 2012.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: The collection is an assemblage of mid-nineteenth century cased portrait images, mostly daguerreotypes and an ambrotype. Most of the images are individual head and shoulder portraits. There are composite shots of Wesleyan University classes of 1849, 1850, 1852, 1853, and 1854. There are a few are full length portrait images. Typically the individuals depicted bear a Wesleyan connection. The cased images are in order of approximate date.

arrangement.head: Collection Arrangement
arrangement.p: The items arranged invidually by type and date.

controlaccess.head: Online Catalog Headings
controlaccess.p: These and related materials may be found under the following headings in online catalogs.
controlaccess.subject: Portraits.

scopecontent.p: Daguerreotype, 1/4 plate, 4 3/4 x 4 inch exterior
Composite. Portrait shots of 33 men shown in 1 row of 3 and 5 columns by 6 rows
Handwritten in inner side of case "Wesleyan University Middletown Conn Graduating Class of 1849"
Front case cover missing
Gift of Mrs. Robert W. Sale in 1969, great-granddaughter of John Wesley Jones, Class of 1849.

Composite. Portrait shots of 20 men shown in 4 columns by 5 rows
